response.original_title: Ben Rosenfeld - Don't Shake Your Miracle
response.overview: Providing some of the blackest humour you might see in the mainstream, autistic Russian Jewish immigrant Ben is fairly unique in the world of comedy. With his punchy delivery, quick wit and driest of quips, Benâ€™s layering of jokes and call backs are unexpectedly rewarding to watch. Most definitely adult humour, this is an edgy hour where parenthood and the mafioso combine with hilarious results.
response.title: Ben Rosenfeld - Don't Shake Your Miracle
